title: A Killing rain (TEFC)
creator_credit: BBC-TV, United Nations Environment Programme and Jeremy Taylor
brief_description: Acid rain is one aspect of environmental pollution discussed at the Public Hearing in London in 1982. This program travels from Scotland to Scandinavia to West Germany to uncover background causes and the effects of this major pollution problem of the 80s.
creator_credit_for_label: BBC-TV, United Nations Environment Programme and Jeremy Taylor
